title: Pasadena Hillside Estate Transformation
summary: 1.2-acre sloped property converted from unusable terrain into multi-level entertaining oasis featuring infinity pool, outdoor kitchen, and native landscape. Engineering addressed 35Â° slopes with tiered retaining walls.
